help_menu.text:
###################################
#  Welcome to Voldemorts Revenge! #
###################################
-Use walk,move to move             
-Type your commands to do them     
-Good luck and have fun!

print2.text:
We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted into Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
You travel to Diagon Alley to do your school shopping.
You reach to Ollivanders to get your wand.

print3.text:
You leave your home to catch the Hogwarts Express from King's Cross railway station's secret Hogwarts platform, Platform ​9 3⁄4.
After arriving at the station, you meet harry and then lead by Hagrid onto boats which they sail to the castle of Hogwarts.
After reaching Hogwarts, you have taken to the common hall for the Sorting Hat ceremony to decide which house you are going to be a part of.
As all Hogwarts students live in one of four residences: Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, or Slytherin.

Professor McGonagall: Hello, and welcome to the sorting of Hogwarts School.

Please come forward and place the hat onto your head.

print4.text:
You and Harry Potter have become good friends and you get to know how Lord Voldemort have killed Harry's parents.
As the semester begins you and Harry been observing weird things happening around Hogwarts and you realise that Voldemort is still alive.
Harry and you have decided to kill him but while going ahead, Harry have been captured by Lord Voldemort!

It's up to you to rescue him now.

print5.text:
As Harry has gone, you are searching ways to start hunting Lord Voldemort.
Your friend Neville suggested you to check with Hagrid as he might know something.
Hagrid told you that he saw someone with a crooked face and asked him the about the directions of prophecy tower.
You realise that you should go their and check if you get something.

As you are walking towards the prophecy tower, your skin begins to tingle...

There is a pitch dark room and you hear a woman's voice to welcoming you in the chamber of secrets..

Woman's Voice: Hi, Welcome to the Chamber of Secrets.

You have three doors in front of you to choose it in order to proceed further.

move1:
You head down the path,

There is a Dark room and you see a giant man coming across you.

Your skin begins to tingle....,

You have come across a Troll...

What spell do you perform to save yourself?

You can choose spells :Expelliarmus, Stupefy, Incendio, Levicorpus
move2:
After your survival from Troll, you are trying to unlock the door.
And you see bunch of keys flying in the room, select the appropriate key to go ahead.
Hint- There are 10 keys and you have to find the correct one.
move3:
After unlocking the mysterious door, you walk in to find Harry...

You again hear woman's voice....
Congratulations! you have successfully opened first door and you reached to second stage of Chambers of secrets
Would you like to continue? (yes or no)
move4:
As you are walking towards the next door.... you hear footsteps approaching...
They're getting louder and louder. You can feel them almost beside you.
And suddenly you see Bellatrix Lestrange holding the prophecy.
 Would you like to continue?(yes or no)
move5:
... after a long survival you see a prophecy lying there..
You begin to think what that must be......
the prophecy says - A son cruelly banished
Despair of the daughter
Return, great avenger
With wings
from the water.
You gasped.........and start moving ahead
You approach the door, surprisingly, it's locked.
you hear a voice - Take off my skin - I won't cry, but you will! What am I?
last_level:
You start to move ahead through the door...
Woman's voice - You're about to face your final challenge.
As you entered the room it's trashed. Chunks of metal everywhere. You see Harry's body lying on the ground.
You run to him to wake him up... but he seemed cursed
Suddenly.. you hear footsteps approaching towards you
Voldemort - Well, well.. so you are here to save Harry
Voldemort - so are you ready to face your utmost fear?
..............what u did to harry?
Voldemort - well you dont worry about him by the time I finish with you I am going to kill him as well.
........ you cant.. I am going to kill you!!!
you put out your wand and start attacking Voldemort
